name: Inflation Idle
description:
Do you ever feel tired with never ending inflation?

Start growing your gas station while increasing your income against inflation. You will start with connecting gas tank to gas pumps, refilling empty tanks, selling gas to angry customers and collect their money as they finish. As your wealth grow, unlock new jobs, hire workers and create your gas empire!

One more thing, be careful! If you are too greedy about your gas prices, people will get angry! (Don't make them agry...)
